Summary: moved rapidly yhen stop about 10 times then after 45 minutes of wacthing it went north at about 3,000 miles per hour
divs: Sighting Detailsi was on my back porch sitting after working all day on it seeing what i neede for tommarow this light caught the corner of my eye i thought it was a shooting star till i seen it stop and hover for about a minute the shoot in the other direction then stop again then there was another one and they was chasing each other i ran to get my mom and wife which i live with and grab my camera the batt was dead put it on the charger 45 minutes later it was still there i got one good picture off one soon as i took the picture the batt went dead again
